availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mahala Robinson Hazell in Green County, Kentucky, on February 24, 1842. Father of Jefferson Hazell and Malissa Hazell. Married to Isabella Mays Hazell in Green County on March 20, 1851. Father of Anna Hazell. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Green County in 1860.
